title: Collaboration between clinicians and vision–language models in radiology report generation
details: R Tanno, DGT Barrett, A Sellergren, S Ghaisas… - Nature Medicine, 2024
abstract: Automated radiology report generation has the potential to improve patient care and reduce the workload of radiologists. However, the path toward real-world adoption has been stymied by the challenge of evaluating the clinical quality of artificial …
